title: SMT CALC
description: SMT CALC is a management website for mosture sensitive level (MSL) components. SMT CALC caculates the time of exposure when a component in on the shop floor, as well as recovery time for the component using IPC/JEDEC Standard J-STD-020.

title: BadIdeasGuy
description: Bad Ideas Guy is a blog site for my investment thoughts and idea's. I wanted a place where I could share my stock picks with friends and family members. Hopefully improving my process along the way.

title: Kitchen Inventory
description: Kitchen Inventory is a mock management site to help keep track of food inventory and expiration. It is hosted on heroku; it might take a bit to boot up. The site is very unsecure so NO personal information when making an account. Logging in use Username: test@gmail.com, Password: Test1234

title: Tetris
description: A recreation of the 1984 game of tetris. Some other features  I added are the start & pause button, score and progressing difficulty. This project was intended to get me familiar with Classes, object oriented programing and matrices.
